name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Face Sunscreen with Vitamin E & SPF 60, Sunscreen for Face with Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB Protection, Fragrance-Free, Oxybenzone-Free, Water-Resistant (80 minutes), 1.7 Fl Oz
short_description: SPF 60 protection: Broad-spectrum sunscreen for face defends against UVA/UVB rays; water-resistant up to 80 minutes for reliable sun protection during outdoor activities and daily use
Face sunscreen moisturizer: Lightweight serum formula hydrates with vitamin E; absorbs quickly with no white cast or greasy feel, making it ideal for layering under makeup or wearing alone
Hydrating spf moisturizer face: Delivers all-day moisture to keep skin soft and smooth; non-comedogenic, fragrance-free, and oxybenzone-free for everyday comfort
Face moisturizer with spf: Doubles as a makeup primer to prep skin for application; dermatologist-recommended Neutrogena brand ensures trusted sun care and hydration benefits
Travel-friendly size: Portable 1.7 fl oz bottle fits easily in handbags or gym bags; perfect for on-the-go sun protection, with a serum-like texture that suits daily routines and active lifestyles
product_description: Package includes one 1.7 fl oz bottle of Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Face Sunscreen with Vitamin E and SPF 60. This face sunscreen moisturizer delivers broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection to help prevent sunburn and, when used as directed with other sun protection measures, decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun. Formulated with Vitamin E, it provides all-day hydration as a face moisturizer with spf, leaving skin soft and smooth without a heavy or greasy feel. The serum-like lotion texture absorbs quickly, making it an ideal spf moisturizer face step in your daily skin care routine and an effective makeup primer under foundation. Its weightless formula does not leave a white cast and maintains a non-greasy finish, so it is comfortable for daily wear. Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, this sunscreen for face is suitable for swimming or sweating, providing reliable protection during outdoor activities. The fragrance-free, oxybenzone-free, and non-comedogenic formula helps prevent pore congestion. As a dermatologist-recommended brand, Neutrogena offers a convenient daily face sunscreen moisturizer that combines sun care and skin care in one step. Use this face sunscreen moisturizer for everyday errands, outdoor activities, or as a makeup base to enjoy hydration, sun protection, and primer benefits. The compact 1.7 fl oz size makes it easy to take on the go, and the serum-like lotion format is designed for those who want a lightweight, non-greasy alternative to traditional lotions. This product is ideal for anyone seeking a face sunscreen moisturizer that fits seamlessly into any skincare routine, providing hydration, sun protection, and a smooth base for makeup without leaving a white cast or heavy residue.

short_description: TSA approved travel bottles, One 3 Fl Oz tube of Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 55. Powerful sun protection without a heavy finish. Travel size sunscreen is perfect for on-the-go
This non-greasy body sunscreen with Helioplex technology shields skin from aging UVA rays and burning UVB rays. Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E, it helps protect your skin from sun damage
Hawaii Act 104 compliant sunscreen is oxybenzone-free. With Dry-Touch technology to absorb quickly, leaving a clean, ultra-light feel and matte finish. It's perfect for daily use wherever you are
The sun screen lotion formula is PABA-free and non-comedogenic so won't clog pores or leave a heavy residue. It is water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, making it ideal for various outdoor activities

Trusted by dermatologists, Neutrogena sunscreen is recommended for use before sun exposure to protect your skin during activities like gardening, biking, hiking, boating, or walking. Enjoy your daily dose of sunshine with peace of mind
product_description: Product Description Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 55 travel size sunscreen provides powerful sun protection that you will love to wear without the heavy finish. Featuring Avobenzone, Homosalate, Octisalate, Octocrylene as active ingredients, this non-greasy body sunscreen is oxybenzone free, Hawaii Act 104 compliant. With Helioplex technology to provide superior UVA/UVB protection from aging UVA rays and burning UVB rays. Enriched with antioxidant vitamin E, the lightweight SPF sun screen lotion with Dry-Touch technology absorbs fast for a clean, ultra-light feel and non-shiny finish. Lotion sunscreen formula is non-comedogenic and PABA-free. This Neutrogena sunscreen is water-resistant for up to 80 minutes and comes from a dermatologist recommended sun care brand. Apply prior to sun exposure to keep skin protected during outdoor activities like gardening, biking, hiking, boating or walking. Protect yourself as you get your daily dose of sunshine. Brand Story By

name: EltaMD UV Sport Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 - Face and Body Sunscreen SPF 50, Water & Sweat Resistant, Zinc Oxide Formula for Active Lifestyles, 3 oz
short_description: WATER AND SWEAT RESISTANT: Enjoy up to 80 minutes of water and sweat resistance with EltaMD UV Sport sunscreen spray, a sunscreen for body ideal for active outdoor lifestyles
FULL BODY PROTECTION: Designed as a sun screen protector for face and body, this SPF 50 sunscreen moisturizer face provides sun protection during your outdoor adventures
SUITABLE FOR ALL ACTIVITIES: Perfect for swimming, running, or golfing, use this water-resistant sunscreen for face that gives reliable sun protection on wet or dry skin
OIL-FREE FORMULA: This oil-free sunscreen for face applies easily without greasy residue, making it the best sunscreen for face women seeking all-around sun protection that's gentle on skin

ZINC OXIDE FORMULA: EltaMD UV Sport features zinc oxide sunscreen for powerful sun protection, also know as protector solar para la cara, effectively blocking harmful rays while the mineral sunscreen face formulation remains gentle on all skin types
product_description: Product Description Discover a new level of sun protection with EltaMD UV AOX Mist Mineral Sunscreen Spray, an SPF 50 face and body sunscreen designed for everyday use. This mineral sunscreen spray combines the nourishing benefits of Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, and Coconut Fruit Extract to leave your skin feeling hydrated while shielding it from harmful UVA/UVB rays. As a sunscreen spray, it utilizes a Zinc Oxide formula that goes on white to ensure complete coverage before absorbing seamlessly into all skin types without leaving streaks or a white cast. This oil-free sunscreen for face and body is water-resistant for up to 40 minutes, making it perfect for active outdoor activities. Designed as both a facial sunscreen and body sunscreen spray, it provides robust protection against sun damage. For optimal results, apply liberally 15 minutes prior to sun exposure and reapply every 40 minutes during swimming or sweating. The EltaMD UV AOX Mist Spray sunscreen spf 50 is fragrance-free, paraben-free, hypoallergenic, and noncomedogenic, ensuring it suits even the most sensitive skin. Embrace the convenience of a spray sunscreen with EltaMD's innovative formula, and protect your skin with this expertly crafted face sunscreen moisturizer and spf body lotion. Brand Story EltaMD Skin Care is committed to helping you have great skin for life. Our company has developed sunscreen, skin care products and wound healing products trusted by physicians for more than 25 years.

short_description: ADVANCED UV DEFENSE: This ultra-lightweight sunscreen delivers the ultimate combination of hydration + defense against harmful UVA + UVB rays + free radicals. All of the protection with none of the drawbacks like white casts, pilling + greasiness!
SHIELD + SOOTHE: Asthaxanthin delivers antioxidant protection 6000x more powerful than Vitamin C + helps to brighten the skin. Hyaluronic Acid hydrates + soothes for softer, stronger skin.
SKIN BARRIER PROTECTION: Formulated with our Cera-Sun Technology to restore the skin barrier while alleviating redness caused by UV exposure.
THE ULTIMATE SKIN-COMPATIBLE SOLUTION: Dermatologist tested + approved skin care, soap-free, non-comedogenic, alcohol + fragrance-free, vegan + cruelty free. Suitable for all skin types.

BACKED BY SCIENCE: Efficacy is the new luxury. That's why BYOMA delivers clinically-proven formulas backed by science + powered by actives. When we stop stripping our skin + start protecting our barrier, we find the key to balanced, brighter skin.
product_description: Formulated with CERASUN TECHNOLOGY to restore the skin barrier while alleviating redness caused by UV exposure. name: COSRX Vitamin E Vitalizing Face Sunscreen SPF 50, 1.69 fl oz, SPF Moisturizer, Lightweight under Makeup, Travel Essentials, Summer Essentials, Korean Skin Care, Korean Sunscreen for Face
short_description: Daily Vitamin E Sunscreen: Sunscreen is a daily essential and should applied at all times when going outdoors, regardless of the weather. Using sunscreen everyday helps protect the skin from UVA and UVB rays, repairing visible signs of aging and damaged skin.

Soft, Comfortable Texture & No Whitecast: The Vitamin E Sunscreen features a lightweight texture that leaves no whitecast on the skin, making it usable for all skin colors. The sunscreen features a semi-matte finish with a natural glow, preventing the skin from looking greasy and controlling excess sebum.
Key Ingredients: SPF 50 provides broad-spectrum UVA & UVB protection. Vitamin E (Tocopherol) protects and strengthens skin. Cacao fights signs of aging, and Cotton helps alleviate redness.

How to Use: Apply as the last step of your skincare routine and before applying makeup. It is highly recommended to apply the sunscreen at least 30 minutes before beginning outdoor activities to maximize benefits.*Suitable for oily, combination skin.

COSRX Standards: All COSRX products are formulated with skin-friendly ingredients that alleviate irritated skin. Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist tested, Animal Testing-FREE, Parabens-FREE, Sulfates-FREE, Phthalates-FREE
